LEGO Batman: The Video Game, as the name implies, is dedicated

and at night - a tireless fighter against crime (dressed in a black 
suit awesome bulletproof latex). In Batman companions gave good old Robin, 
but opponents of the Dark Knight is more than enough - a few pieces on one l
evel. Among them there are such extraordinary and famous personalities l
ike crazy Joker (whose role in the film played the inimitable Jack Nicholson), 
Catwoman (not the one that Halle Berry and evil and cunning professional 
thief), two-faced, constantly throwing up his coin, 
unpredictable and green Riddler, one fridge Mr. Freeze, Penguin shorty,
